thread.title: Defense Secretary James Mattis Reacts to Flynn Resignation: ‘Frankly, This Has No Impact’
thread.title_full: Defense Secretary James Mattis Reacts to Flynn Resignation: ‘Frankly, This Has No Impact’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Defense Secretary James Mattis Reacts to Flynn Resignation: ‘Frankly, This Has No Impact’
text:
Defense Secretary James Mattis Reacts to Flynn Resignation: ‘Frankly, This Has No Impact’ by Josh Feldman | 7:00   Jim Mattis, flying to NATO today, responds to Mike Flynn's resignation & concern among US allies about Russian influence in American affairs pic.twitter.com/Y1GnkRqFS6 
— Andrew deGrandpre (@adegrandpre) February 14, 2017 
Defense Secretary James Mattis reacted to the resignation of Michael Flynn by telling reporters earlier today it doesn’t really have much of an impact on him. 
Mattis made those remarks en route to a NATO meeting, “Frankly, this has no impact. Obviously I haven’t changed what I’m heading there for. It doesn’t change my message at all.” 
There have been a few reports since the election about friction between Mattis and Flynn . 
Mattis said today he fully intends to work with whoever is on the president’s staff, explaining his main goals are to “listen, learn, help, and lead.” 
You can watch the clip above. 
Correction: A previous version of this post said that Mattis is the Homeland Security Secretary. He is the Defense Secretary. 
[ image via screengrab ]
